mapper.select: select i.id itemId, s.name stuffName, i.apply_time applyTime, i.create_time createTime, i.rent_day rentDay, i.end_time endTime, i.status from item i inner join stuff s on i.stuff_id = s.id and s.mark = 1 where i.mark = 1 and i.user_id = #{userId}

select i.id itemId, s.name stuffName, i.apply_time applyTime, i.create_time createTime, i.rent_day rentDay, i.end_time endTime, i.status, u1.username renterName, u2.username ownerName from item i inner join stuff s on i.stuff_id = s.id and s.mark = 1 inner join user u1 on i.user_id = u1.id and u1.mark = 1 inner join user u2 on s.user_id = u2.id and u2.mark = 1 where i.mark = 1
